Uses of Class
org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.PersistentObject.Snapshot

  • Packages that use PersistentObject.Snapshot 
    Package Description
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj
    Simple XML Persistence Objects (POBJ).
    org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib
    Classes that facilitate synchronizing a PersistentObject database across multiple nodes.

    • Uses of PersistentObject.Snapshot in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj

      Methods in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj that return PersistentObject.Snapshot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      PersistentObject.Snapshot PersistentObject.getRootSnapshot()
      Read the root object (as with PersistentObject.getRoot()) and its version (as with PersistentObject.getVersion()) in one atomic operation.
      PersistentObject.Snapshot PersistentObject.getSharedRootSnapshot()
      Read the shared root object (as with PersistentObject.getSharedRoot()) and its version (as with PersistentObject.getVersion()) in one atomic operation.

    • Uses of PersistentObject.Snapshot in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib

      Methods in org.dellroad.stuff.pobj.distrib with parameters of type PersistentObject.Snapshot 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void Synchronizer.applyLocalUpdate(PersistentObject.Snapshot snapshot, String commitMessage)
      Given a (possibly) updated local root, commit it to our local branch, Synchronizer.synchronize() with our peers if it represented a change, and apply the newly merged root (if any) back to the associated PersistentObject.
